level.heading: Extension of time for registration.
level.text: ยง 27-2103 Extension of time for registration. In any case where the owner or other person required to file is unable to comply with the registration requirements within the applicable time period specified in this article, the department may, upon good cause shown, extend the registration period and waive the penalties for failure to register set forth in section 27-2107 of this article during such period.
